definition: A departure from what is normal or expected
example: The sudden snowstorm in summer was an aberration.

definition: A harsh, discordant mixture of sounds
example: The cacophony of the city was overwhelming.

definition: A division or contrast between two things that are represented as being opposed or entirely different
example: The dichotomy between good and evil is a common theme in literature.
Her ebullient personality made her the life of the party.
